attributes.action: White ceramic poppies ready and displayed @ Tower of London in 2018.
attributes.background: To mark and celebrate the end of WW1  - 100 years on.....in the same manner as the red ones 2 years ago which marked the start of WW1.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for displays at the Tower of London.

The Tower of London is the responsibility of Historic Royal Palaces. You could write to them to make this suggestion:

http://www.hrp.org.uk/tower-of-london/visit-us/contact-us/
